text: Ted Hill (15 January 1914 - 1 July 1986) was a former Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood and Fitzroy in the Victorian Football League (VFL). Hill was appointed as captain / coach of Culcairn in 1952 and lead them to the 1952 Albury & District Football League premiership. == Notes == == External links == * Category:1914 births Category:1986 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players Category:Fitzroy Football Club players Category:Coburg Football Club players
title: Ted Hill (footballer)
